title: Gud name change /10 nerds?
body:
This is AimedDust lel what r ur thorts on my new name changerino
not that i care but k
8==D
~~

replies.body: You should change it again to BigotedIdiot, considering you think incorporating the holocaust into your name is funny or cool.

2/10 because "Heimer" is in it.

Otherwise it would have been 1/10, you didn't even try.

> [{quoted}](name=SEKAI,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=iLIuLKWn,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2015-01-26T08:47:11.331+0000)
